data.name: Space Station Demo
data.detailed_description:
Add game to Wishlist!


Space Station is a classic metroidvania adventure on an abandoned space station with beautiful pixel art graphics.
Collect secret artifacts, unlock space suit upgrades, find new weapons and special devices
and hack your own way through the corridors of the mysterious space research station "SIMBIRSK "!

Plot:

The space station “Simbirsk” is engaged in genetic engineering and secret developments to solve the global problems of mankind. The government sends you to the station in order to steal the DNA of rare animals and the results of experiments.
Arriving at “Simbirsk” you meet aggressive creatures and understand that a catastrophe has taken place here. Although some of your functions are locked by the program, you can unlock new abilities with data disks to get out of the station alive and complete the mission.

About the game:

The game is a sequel to Space Expedition and offers fascinating gameplay and a non-linear storyline with four endings. Your actions and decisions directly affect the ending of the story. Are you ready to start a journey and take a fresh look at space adventures?

Key features

  • Game - Classic 2D metroidvania platformer with beautiful pixel art.
  • Atmosphere - Explore the abandoned space station with atmospheric levels and unique characters.
  • Weapons - Use an arsenal of weapons - a sword, gun, flamethrower and more - to defeat aggressive creatures in the most effective ways.
  • Special suit - Find data disks hidden on the space station to unlock unique motion and combat abilities.
  • Alternative endings - There is a non-linear story with four endings in the game. The final of the story depends on your actions and decisions.
  • Free exploration - Go through the levels of the space station in a free order discovering secrets and fighting rivals.
  • Music - The atmospheric soundtrack and manually produced sound effects convey the unique atmosphere of the game and immerse you in a real space adventure.
